messages.message: hey team, as we start to design the AI runtime changes, i wanted to confirm that in the same way we allow for testing an app w/ a non-latest 1.0.x runtime using the latest 1.0.x runtime before upgrading, we'll allow a user to test running an app originally created w/ runtime 1.0.x using runtime 2.0.x cc @margaret.tomaszczuk (this makes sense, but just some technical implications so just wanted to check)

Interested to hear the answer. I assumed the mode switcher in projects was the only way to upgrade to 2.x, and you'd therefore have to create a new app version.

Is it actually possible to update _existing app versions_ from AI runtime 1.x to 2.x? I would have thought too many changes were involved to the underlying project to support direct updates of app versions.
